So I ask those who live in Virginia. Are you proud of your state?
 http://www.washblade.com/2006/12-15/arts/feature/parents.cfm
 
 Will you be proud or happy when the first child is hurt by the actions of your fellow citizens. Spured on by the religious right?
The state doesn't deserve these good people.
The good thing about having states decide these things is that if you don't like it you can leave. If you do like it you can move there. Seems the process is working very well.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Fight or flight?
